Class HairSettingsRef

java.lang.Object
com.github.stephengold.joltjni.JoltPhysicsObject
com.github.stephengold.joltjni.template.Ref
com.github.stephengold.joltjni.HairSettingsRef
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConstHairSettings, ConstJoltPhysicsObject, AutoCloseable, Comparable<JoltPhysicsObject>
public final class HairSettingsRef extends Ref implements ConstHairSettings
A counted reference to a HairSettings object. (native type: Ref<HairSettings>)
